tool_description: Transfers selected items from wishlist to shopping cart with quantity and preference specifications.

item_ids.description: Array of wishlist item IDs to transfer to cart

quantities.description: Array of quantities for each item (must match item_ids array length)

remove_from_wishlist.description: Whether to remove items from wishlist after transfer

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: item_ids and quantities arrays must have the same length.
Invalid quantity: All quantities must be positive integers.
Cart capacity exceeded: Too many items to add to cart at once.
Item transfer failed: One or more items could not be transferred due to availability issues.
Wishlist access denied: User does not have permission to modify this wishlist.
usage: Provide user_id, matching arrays of item_ids and quantities to transfer. Optionally choose whether to remove items from wishlist after successful transfer.

transfer_success.description: Whether all items were successfully transferred

transferred_items.description: Array of item IDs that were successfully transferred

failed_transfers.description: Array of item IDs that failed to transfer

cart_total_items.description: Total number of items in cart after transfer
